ygData.subject: Re: twinked? / EQ ettiquette
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I find it kind of rude for people to be snooping in other peoples stuff! Is inspect a totally accepted thing, or is there some sort of ettiquette that
ygData.messageBody:
--- Lanadina the Magician <lanadina@...>
wrote:
> I'm thinking back in old school, when I first
> started playing. The FBR back
> then was the GOD robe....when the oracle robe
> was found, people nearly fell
> over themselves just to do an inspect on me <G>
>
> Lana
>

I find it kind of rude for people to be snooping
in other peoples stuff! Is 'inspect' a totally
accepted thing, or is there some sort of
ettiquette that goes along with it? I don't mind
so much if I've been chatting with someone for a
little while and they take a peek [it's not like
I have anything good to hide!] but when people
come right up to you, snoop, and then don't even
respond when you say 'Hail' , I find that
extremely annoying. Any comments, guys?

Sinarya
6th DE Necromancer
Veeshan

=====
* Selene *
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

"Ten of your American dollars says God is a woman." Emilia
"Well, that explains why we're always trying to please her and nothing we ever do is good enough!" Jack <Jack of All Trades> 'Floundering Fathers'
